<p align="center">
    <b>Fiber</b>, <a href="https://go.dev/doc/">Go</a> iÃ§in <b>en hÄ±zlÄ±</b> HTTP sunucusu olan <a href="https://github.com/valyala/fasthttp">Fasthttp</a> Ã¼zerine inÅŸa edilmiÅŸ ve <a href="https://github.com/expressjs/express">Express</a>'ten ilham almÄ±ÅŸ bir <b>web framework'Ã¼dÃ¼r</b>. <b>SÄ±fÄ±r bellek atamasÄ±</b> ve <b>performans</b> gÃ¶z Ã¶nÃ¼nde bulundurularak <b>hÄ±zlÄ±</b> geliÅŸtirme ve <b>kolay</b> geliÅŸtirme iÃ§in tasarlanmÄ±ÅŸtÄ±r.
</p>

## âš¡ï¸ HÄ±zlÄ± BaÅŸlangÄ±Ã§

```go
package main

import "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Get("/", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendString("Hello, World ğŸ‘‹!")
    })

    app.Listen(":3000")
}
```

## ğŸ¤– Performans Ã–lÃ§Ã¼mleri

Bu testler [TechEmpower](https://www.techempower.com/benchmarks/#section=data-r19&hw=ph&test=plaintext) ve [Go Web](https://github.com/smallnest/go-web-framework-benchmark) tarafÄ±ndan gerÃ§ekleÅŸtirildi. BÃ¼tÃ¼n sonuÃ§larÄ± gÃ¶rmek iÃ§in lÃ¼tfen [Wiki](https://docs.gofiber.io/extra/benchmarks) sayfasÄ±nÄ± ziyaret ediniz.

<p float="left" align="middle">
  <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gofiber/docs/master/static/img/benchmark-pipeline.png" width="49%">

</p>

## âš™ï¸ Kurulum

Go'nun `1.17` sÃ¼rÃ¼mÃ¼ ([indir](https://go.dev/dl/)) veya daha yÃ¼ksek bir sÃ¼rÃ¼m gerekli.

Bir dizin oluÅŸturup dizinin iÃ§inde `go mod init github.com/your/repo` komutunu yazarak projenizi geliÅŸtirmeye baÅŸlayÄ±n ([daha fazla Ã¶ÄŸren](https://go.dev/blog/using-go-modules)). ArdÄ±ndan Fiber'Ä± kurmak iÃ§in [`go get`](https://pkg.go.dev/cmd/go/#hdr-Add_dependencies_to_current_module_and_install_them) komutunu Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rÄ±n:

```bash
go get -u github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2
```

## ğŸ¯ Ã–zellikler

-   GÃ¼Ã§lÃ¼ [routing](https://docs.gofiber.io/guide/routing)
-   [Statik dosya](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#static) sunumu
-   OlaÄŸanÃ¼stÃ¼ [performans](https://docs.gofiber.io/extra/benchmarks)
-   [DÃ¼ÅŸÃ¼k bellek](https://docs.gofiber.io/extra/benchmarks) kullanÄ±mÄ±
-   [API uÃ§ noktalarÄ±](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx)
-   Middleware'lar & [Next](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#next) desteÄŸi
-   [HÄ±zlÄ±](https://dev.to/koddr/welcome-to-fiber-an-express-js-styled-fastest-web-framework-written-with-on-golang-497) sunucu taraflÄ± programlama
-   [Template motorlarÄ±](https://github.com/gofiber/template)
-   [WebSocket desteÄŸi](https://github.com/gofiber/websocket)
-   [Server-Sent eventler](https://github.com/gofiber/recipes/tree/master/sse)
-   [Rate Limiter](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/limiter)
-   [19 dilde](https://docs.gofiber.io/) mevcut
-   Ve daha fazlasÄ±, [Fiber'Ä± keÅŸfet](https://docs.gofiber.io/)

## ğŸ’¡ Felsefe

[Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/about/)'ten [Go](https://go.dev/doc/)'ya geÃ§en yeni gopherlar kendi web uygulamalarÄ±nÄ± ve mikroservislerini yazmaya baÅŸlamadan Ã¶nce dili Ã¶ÄŸrenmek ile uÄŸraÅŸÄ±yorlar. Fiber, bir **framework** olarak, **minimalizm** ve **UNIX yolu**nu izleme fikri ile oluÅŸturuldu. BÃ¶ylece yeni gopherlar sÄ±cak ve gÃ¼venilir bir hoÅŸ geldin ile Go dÃ¼nyasÄ±na giriÅŸ yapabilirler.

Fiber, internet Ã¼zerinde en popÃ¼ler web framework'Ã¼ olan Express'ten **esinlenmiÅŸtir**. Biz Express'in **kolaylÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ±** ve Go'nun **ham performansÄ±nÄ±** birleÅŸtirdik. Daha Ã¶nce Node.js Ã¼zerinde (Express veya benzerini kullanarak) bir web uygulamasÄ± geliÅŸtirdiyseniz, pek Ã§ok metod ve prensip size **oldukÃ§a tanÄ±dÄ±k** gelecektir.

## âš ï¸ SÄ±nÄ±rlamalar

-   Fiber unsafe kullanÄ±mÄ± sebebiyle Go'nun son sÃ¼rÃ¼mÃ¼yle her zaman uyumlu olmayabilir. Fiber 2.40.0, Go 1.17 ile 1.21 sÃ¼rÃ¼mleriyle test edildi.
-   Fiber net/http arabirimiyle uyumlu deÄŸildir. Yani gqlgen veya go-swagger gibi net/http ekosisteminin parÃ§asÄ± olan projeleri kullanamazsÄ±nÄ±z.

## ğŸ‘€ Ã–rnekler

AÅŸaÄŸÄ±da yaygÄ±n Ã¶rneklerden bazÄ±larÄ± listelenmiÅŸtir. Daha fazla kod Ã¶rneÄŸi gÃ¶rmek iÃ§in lÃ¼tfen [Github reposunu](https://github.com/gofiber/recipes) veya [API dokÃ¼mantasyonunu](https://docs.gofiber.io) ziyaret ediniz.

#### ğŸ“– [**Basit Rotalama**](https://docs.gofiber.io/#basic-routing)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // GET /api/kayit
    app.Get("/api/*", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("âœ‹ %s", c.Params("*"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => âœ‹ kayit
    })

    // GET /flights/IST-ESB
    app.Get("/flights/:kalkis-:inis", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ’¸ KalkÄ±ÅŸ: %s, Ä°niÅŸ: %s", c.Params("kalkis"), c.Params("inis"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => ğŸ’¸ KalkÄ±ÅŸ: IST, Ä°niÅŸ: ESB
    })

    // GET /sozluk.txt
    app.Get("/:file.:ext", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ“ƒ %s.%s", c.Params("file"), c.Params("ext"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => ğŸ“ƒ sozluk.txt
    })

    // GET /muhittin/75
    app.Get("/:isim/:yas/:cinsiyet?", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ‘´ %s %s yaÅŸÄ±nda", c.Params("isim"), c.Params("yas"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => ğŸ‘´ muhittin 75 yaÅŸÄ±nda
    })

    // GET /muhittin
    app.Get("/:isim", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("Merhaba, %s ğŸ‘‹!", c.Params("isim"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => Merhaba Muhittin ğŸ‘‹!
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

#### ğŸ“– [**Route Ä°simlendirmesi**](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#name)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // GET /api/register
    app.Get("/api/*", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("âœ‹ %s", c.Params("*"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => âœ‹ kayit
    }).Name("api")

    data, _ := json.MarshalIndent(app.GetRoute("api"), "", "  ")
    fmt.Print(string(data))
    // Cikti:
    // {
    //    "method": "GET",
    //    "name": "api",
    //    "path": "/api/*",
    //    "params": [
    //      "*1"
    //    ]
    // }


    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

#### ğŸ“– [**Statik Dosya Sunumu**](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#static)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Static("/", "./public")
    // => http://localhost:3000/js/script.js
    // => http://localhost:3000/css/style.css

    app.Static("/prefix", "./public")
    // => http://localhost:3000/prefix/js/script.js
    // => http://localhost:3000/prefix/css/style.css

    app.Static("*", "./public/index.html")
    // => http://localhost:3000/any/path/shows/index/html

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

#### ğŸ“– [**Middleware & Next**](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#next)

```go
func main() {
	app := fiber.New()

	// BÃ¼tÃ¼n routelara etki eder.
	app.Use(func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
		fmt.Println("ğŸ¥‡ Ä°lk handler")
		return c.Next()
	})

	// /api ile baÅŸlayan bÃ¼tÃ¼n routelara etki eder.
	app.Use("/api", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
		fmt.Println("ğŸ¥ˆ Ä°kinci handler")
		return c.Next()
	})

	// GET /api/register
	app.Get("/api/list", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
		fmt.Println("ğŸ¥‰ Son handler")
		return c.SendString("Merhaba, DÃ¼nya ğŸ‘‹!")
	})

	log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

<details>
  <summary>ğŸ“š Daha fazla kod Ã¶rneÄŸi gÃ¶ster</summary>

### View MotorlarÄ±

ğŸ“– [YapÄ±landÄ±rma](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/fiber#config)
ğŸ“– [Motorlar](https://github.com/gofiber/template)
ğŸ“– [Render](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#render)

HiÃ§bir View Motoru ayarlanmadÄ±ÄŸÄ±nda Fiber varsayÄ±lan olarak [html/template'a](https://pkg.go.dev/html/template/) geÃ§er.

KÄ±smi yÃ¼rÃ¼tmek istiyorsanÄ±z veya [amber](https://github.com/eknkc/amber), [handlebars](https://github.com/aymerick/raymond), [mustache](https://github.com/cbroglie/mustache) veya [pug](https://github.com/Joker/jade) gibi farklÄ± motorlar kullanmak istiyorsanÄ±z

Ã‡oklu View Engine destekleyen [Template'Ä±mÄ±za](https://github.com/gofiber/template gÃ¶z atÄ±n.

```go
package main

import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/template/pug"
)

func main() {
    // UygulamayÄ± baÅŸlatmadan Ã¶nce View Engine tanÄ±mlayabilirsiniz:
    app := fiber.New(fiber.Config{
        Views: pug.New("./views", ".pug"),
    })

    // Ve ÅŸimdi `./views/home.pug` templateni ÅŸu ÅŸekilde Ã§aÄŸÄ±rabilirsiniz:
    app.Get("/", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.Render("home", fiber.Map{
            "title": "Homepage",
            "year":  1999,
        })
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### RoutelarÄ± Zincirler Halinde Gruplama

ğŸ“– [Group](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#group)

```go
func middleware(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
    fmt.Println("Beni umursama!")
    return c.Next()
}

func handler(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
    return c.SendString(c.Path())
}

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // Root API route
    api := app.Group("/api", middleware) // /api

    // API v1 routelarÄ±
    v1 := api.Group("/v1", middleware) // /api/v1
    v1.Get("/list", handler)           // /api/v1/list
    v1.Get("/user", handler)           // /api/v1/user

    // API v2 routelarÄ±
    v2 := api.Group("/v2", middleware) // /api/v2
    v2.Get("/list", handler)           // /api/v2/list
    v2.Get("/user", handler)           // /api/v2/user

    // ...
}
```

### Middleware Loglama (Logger)

ğŸ“– [Logger](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/logger)

```go
package main

import (
	"fmt"

	"github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
	"github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/logger"
)

func main() {
	app := fiber.New()

	app.Use(logger.New())

	// ...

	log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### FarklÄ± Originler ArasÄ± Kaynak PaylaÅŸÄ±mÄ± (CORS)

ğŸ“– [CORS](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/cors)

```go
import (
    "log"

    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/cors"
)

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Use(cors.New())

    // ...

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

`Origin` baÅŸlÄ±ÄŸÄ± iÃ§inde herhangi bir alan adÄ± kullanarak CORS'u kontrol edin:

```bash
curl -H "Origin: http://example.com" --verbose http://localhost:3000
```

### Ã–zelleÅŸtirilebilir 404 yanÄ±tlarÄ±

ğŸ“– [HTTP MethodlarÄ±](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#status)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Static("/", "./public")

    app.Get("/demo", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendString("Bu bir demodur!")
    })

    app.Post("/register", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendString("HoÅŸgeldiniz!")
    })

    // HiÃ§bir endpointle eÅŸleÅŸmezse gideceÄŸi middleware ve yanÄ±tÄ±.
    app.Use(func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendStatus(404)
        // => 404 "Sayfa bulunamadÄ±"
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### JSON YanÄ±tlarÄ±

ğŸ“– [JSON](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#json)

```go
type User struct {
    Isim string `json:"name"`
    Yas  int    `json:"age"`
}

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Get("/user", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.JSON(&User{"Muhittin Topalak", 20})
        // => {"Isim":"Muhittin Topalak", "Yas":20}
    })

    app.Get("/json", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.JSON(fiber.Map{
            "success": true,
            "mesaj": "Merhaba Muhittin Topalak!",
        })
        // => {"success":true, "message":"Merhaba Muhittin Topalak!"}
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### WebSocket DesteÄŸi

ğŸ“– [Websocket](https://github.com/gofiber/websocket)

```go
import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/websocket"
)

func main() {
  app := fiber.New()

  app.Get("/ws", websocket.New(func(c *websocket.Conn) {
    for {
      mt, msg, err := c.ReadMessage()
      if err != nil {
        log.Println("read:", err)
        break
      }
      log.Printf("recv: %s", msg)
      err = c.WriteMessage(mt, msg)
      if err != nil {
        log.Println("write:", err)
        break
      }
    }
  }))

  log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
  // ws://localhost:3000/ws
}
```

### Server-Sent Eventler

ğŸ“– [Daha Fazla Bilgi](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Server-sent_events/Using_server-sent_events)

```go
import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/valyala/fasthttp"
)

func main() {
  app := fiber.New()

  app.Get("/sse", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
    c.Set("Content-Type", "text/event-stream")
    c.Set("Cache-Control", "no-cache")
    c.Set("Connection", "keep-alive")
    c.Set("Transfer-Encoding", "chunked")

    c.Context().SetBodyStreamWriter(fasthttp.StreamWriter(func(w *bufio.Writer) {
      fmt.Println("WRITER")
      var i int

      for {
        i++
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("%d - the time is %v", i, time.Now())
        fmt.Fprintf(w, "data: Message: %s\n\n", msg)
        fmt.Println(msg)

        w.Flush()
        time.Sleep(5 * time.Second)
      }
    }))

    return nil
  })

  log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### Middleware KurtarÄ±cÄ±sÄ±

ğŸ“– [Recover](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/recover)

```go
import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/recover"
)

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Use(recover.New())

    app.Get("/", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        panic("normalde bu uygulamanÄ±zÄ± Ã§Ã¶kertir.")
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

</details>
